name: Termius
long_description: Termius is an SSH client that works on desktop and mobile. It syncs and shares data via a secure vault in the cloud, like a password manager. With Termius, engineering and DevOps teams can share the list of servers that can be organized in groups and tagged for faster search. Termius also has built-in Terminal and Snippet Sharing. Terminal Sharing enables getting instant help from colleagues via providing a unique link instantly, and snippets are frequently-used shell commands that allow teammates to learn from each other easily.
one_liner: Termius is an SSH client with team collaboration features
